name: Impetus (PixelRifts, The Fresnel Sandwich)
description:
Use Cards to apply Forces on Objects.

Mass card: applies a gravitational force

Charge card: applies an electrostatic force

Get the + object to your side of the board or the x object to the opponent's side to win

Made by 3 people in a span of 8 days.

Game Design: Atharva Godbole

Programming: Nikhil Kelkar

Art: Pranav Kondapalli
